title: Movie Segment "The Bishop of Battle" Nightmares (1983)

sources.title: Movie Segment "The Bishop of Battle" Nightmares (1983)
sources.description: This is a segment titled "The Bishop of Battle" from the movie "Nightmares" from (1983). A teenager (Emilio Estevez) gets obsessed with beating a video game. The voice of the bishop is James Tolken who played Mr. Strickland on "Back to the Future."
